item.title: Naza plans listing in Q3
item.description: Group managing director Tan Sri S.M. Nasimuddin S.M. Amin says the flotation exercise is expected in the third quarter following its prospectus launch in the middle of this year

item.title: Proton shares slide despite MD's assurance
item.description: Newly-appointed managing director Syed Zainal says that by year-end, Proton will be cost-effective, offer better quality products and have a wider range of offerings to appeal to a broader market

item.title: Inflation not expected to intensify: Zeti
item.description: Governor Tan Sri Dr Zeti Akhtar Aziz says the central bank will maintain a vigilant stance against inflation, but will not use its currency to control monetary policy
